messages.title: Putting you first
messages.content: Andrew Miller is working hard to fight for local jobs and to secure the best education for our children.

messages.title: Andrew Miller is working hard to ensure security in retirement for our pensioners.
Andrew Miller is fighting for decent and affordable housing for local people.
Andrew Miller is working with local law enforcement to put more police on our streets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports high-tech & green industries, and development in carbon capture and low carbon technologies.
Labour will work hard to secure the best education for our children.
Labour will work hard to ensure security in retirement for our pensioners.
Labour will continue fighting for decent and affordable housing for local people.
Labour will work with local law enforcement to put more police on our streets.

issues.education: Labour will work hard to secure the best education for our children.

issues.socialWelfare: Labour will work hard to ensure security in retirement for our pensioners.

housing.content: Labour will continue fighting for decent and affordable housing for local people.

quotes.text: Labour's Strategic Investment Fund, worth Â£350m will create jobs and apprenticeships.
The Tories' reckless cut now and pay later projects, are the worst possible risks to our economic recovery.
